2.text: Choose okra that is evenly green and about 2 to 4 inches (5-10 cm) long.

5.text: Prevent okra from becoming slimy during cooking.

6.text: Know how to prepare the okra for different dishes.

7.text: Use garlic and spices with okra.

9.text: Slice the okra in 1/4 inch (6.35mm) slices.

11.text: While that's soaking, put about a cup of cornmeal in a dish with salt and pepper.

12.text: After soaking for a while, dredge the slices in the cornmeal, covering evenly.

13.text: Heat about a 1/2 a cup of oil in a skillet on medium to high heat.

14.text: When the oil is hot, carefully place the okra into the pan.

15.text: Stir continuously, making sure it doesn't burn.
